command.description: Change the mode of the legend
command.name: Change D2D legend mode

command.description: Locates the cursor on the screen
command.name: Locate Cursor

command.description: Switches editor to a two panel layout
command.name: Two Panel Layout

command.description: Switches editor to a four panel layout
command.name: Four Panel Layout

command.description: Show the AWIPS II Print Dialog
command.name: Show Print Dialog

command.description: Increases the blend amout on a blended resource
command.name: Increase Blend

command.description: Decreases the blend amout on a blended resource
command.name: Decrease Blend

mouseAction.description: Show/Hide a resource when a user clicks on the title in the legend
mouseAction.name: Show/Hide Resource
